'''Richard Marcus Lloyd Owen''' is a Welsh actor. He has portrayed [[Elendil]] in the television series [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]] by Amazon.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://twitter.com/LOTRonPrime/status/1547417424361885696|articlename=Lloyd Owen is Elendil|dated=October 08, 2022|website=Twitter|accessed=February 14, 2022}}</ref>
